description.narrative: In OPT, FAIR for ALL programme aims at contributing to more inclusive and sustainable trade and value chains in OPT and create an enabling environment that respects women and men small-scale producers and their rights, protects the environment and supports youth economic empowerment. Transparency Palestine (AMAN): Palestinian think tank with specialized knowledge in corruption and accountability of public actors. Promotes integrity, transparency and accountability in public administration, working with broad alliance of CSO partners. Aiming to advocate for increased budget allocation in the agricultural sector, increased transparency, accountability and reallocation of budgets to respond to the needs of Palestinians in general and the targeted groups in particular;

participating-org.narrative: The Coalition for Accountability an Integrity - AMAN

The Coalition for Accountability and Integrity (AMAN) has been active since 2000 in the field of democracy human rights and good governance and as a movement aims to combat corruption and enhance the values of integrity and principles of transparency andsystems of accountability in the Palestinian society. Soon after its formation, AMAN established the separate unit - Civil Society Team to Support General Budget Transparency arguably the only local entity systematically working on public finance accountability in OPT. Since then the team has been successful in producing citizens budgets and ensuring financial transparency and accountability of the PA by holding periodic public hearings and accountability sessions with the Ministry of Finance regarding the general budget economic and financial policies as well as PAs revenue allocation and expenditures. Pioneers in public finance accountability work in OPT, AMAN remains uniquely position local organization with technical capacity to tackle national budgets and tax system.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands
